whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.p1: SahayaKISSAN is a technology-driven agricultural platform built with one purpose — to empower Indian farmers through clarity, access, and innovation.
whoWeAre.p2: We connect agriculture, research, technology, and policy into one unified digital ecosystem that supports farmers at every step.
whoWeAre.imageAlt: Farmers working together in agricultural fields

whyMatters.title: Why SahayaKISSAN Matters
whyMatters.p1: Farmers today face growing uncertainty — climate change, unpredictable markets, and lack of timely information.
whyMatters.p2: SahayaKISSAN simplifies decision-making by bringing data, government schemes, and modern agri-tech into one accessible platform.
